price: Cəhənnəm əhli ilə Cənnət əhli eyni ola bilməz. Məhz Cənnət əhli uğur qazanan kimsələrdir.
arabic: لَا يَسۡتَوِيٓ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۚ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā yastawī aṣḥābu al-nāri wa-aṣḥābu al-janati aṣḥābu al-janati humu al-fāizūna
